page.title: 03OAKHILL
page.content: Oakhill is situated on the main road to Bath.The only industry is brewing.It has a village school with 113 children who go to surrounding towns for secondary school. The houses are a mixture of old cottages, newly converted old buildings and modern architect designed houses. There are three very large old houses_ one now used as a restaurant,one as a museum and the third still a privately owned estate.Most people leave the village for employment in nearby towns and cities of Bath and Bristol. Local events centre around the church and the school like fetes and jumble sales. There is a village Cricket and Football Club; a choir that has won alot of competitions, a band and many other clubs for young and old people.
